name: hrw-mini-apps
description: Multiple React Mini Apps for React Native WebView

scripts.build: npm run build:feedback && npm run build:home && npm run copy:dist
scripts.copy:dist: mkdir -p dist && cp -r feedback-mini-app/dist dist/feedback-mini-app && cp -r home-page-mini-app/dist dist/home-page-mini-app
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd feedback-mini-app && npm install && cd ../home-page-mini-app && npm install
